channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13437] httpserver getPort does not return the actual port when attempting to use a dynamic port
item.summary: httpserver getPort does not return the actual port when attempting to use a dynamic port

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Trivial patch. sershe, prasanth_j - could you please take a look.
Hmm... then what is the port field for? Will this still be correct for static port?
The port field is the initial configuration. I can rename that accordingly if you think this will be confusing.

Updated patch. Removes the port variable completely. Makes name mandatory, and adds a log line indicating the port on which the service was started.

sershe - please take a look again.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12797402/HIVE-13437.02.patch

Does this need to be documented in the wiki?
After the HiveServer web ui configuration is documented, we can add a note there to say that 0 is a valid port, and will bring up the UI on a random port.
Okay, I'll add a TODOC2.1 label as a reminder. Thanks.
